page.title: 15MOBILE SHOPS
page.content: As the choice of shops in a rural area is limited people rely on the mobile shops a great deal especially older people who cannot manage on the buses and who have nobody either to take them to town or to go for them. Horbling and Billingborough have several mobile shops including 4 butchers who come on different days, a greengrocer who comes once a week, a baker, a grocer, a wet fish van, a Fish and Chip van and of course the daily milk delivery. The latter is very important in rural districts as it is the only way of getting fresh milk.
